snippet.title: Endhall Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy on Itchio: https://uheartbeast.itch.io/endhall

This is a trailer video for my upcoming indie title, Endhall. The game is a turn-based roguelike set to release on November 28th 2018.

If you like short, problem solving games with relaxing music, this is the game for you.

Follow me on Twitch for GameMaker livestreams: http://www.twitch.tv/uheartbeast

Twitter: https://twitter.com/uheartbeast
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/heartbeast.studios
Tumblr: http://uheartbeast.tumblr.com/

Thank you all so much for your support!
